pages.text: $(item)Recipes$() will sometimes drop from hostile mobs when killed. These Recipes come in a few different tiers, ranging from D all the way to SSS. Each Recipe holds new Keyblades, Armors and Accessories to be Synthesized. Once you run out of Recipes to learn from a specific tier, combine 2 of the same tiered Recipe in a Crafting Table or in your Inventory, this will craft a Recipe of the next tier.
